arabe: اللهم اكفني شر ما أخاف وأحذر.
anglais: O Allah, protect me from the evil of what I fear and dread.
translitteration: Allahumma ikfini sharr ma akhafu wa ahdhar.

arabe: حسبي الله لا إله إلا هو عليه توكلت وهو رب العرش العظيم.
anglais: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
translitteration: Hasbunallāhu lā ilāha illā Huwa, ‘alayhi tawakkaltu wa Huwa rabbul-‘arshil-‘azīm.

arabe: اللهم أزل خوفي واملأ قلبي بالسكينة.
anglais: O Allah, remove my fear and fill my heart with tranquility.
translitteration: Allahumma azil khawfi wa amla’ qalbi bil-sakīna.

arabe: اللهم أنت حسبي ووكيلي.
anglais: O Allah, You are my sufficiency and my guardian.
translitteration: Allahumma Anta ḥasbī wa wakīlī.

arabe: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخوف إلا منك.
anglais: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from fear except of You.
translitteration: Allahumma innī a’ūdhu bika min al-khawfi illā minka.

arabe: اللهم اجعلني أذكرك عند الخوف فتطمئن نفسي.
anglais: O Allah, make me remember You in fear so my soul becomes tranquil.
translitteration: Allahumma ajilnī adhkuruka ‘inda al-khawfi fatatma’innu nafsī.

arabe: سبحان الله العظيم.
anglais: Glory be to Allah, the Most Great.
translitteration: Subḥān Allāh al-‘Azīm.

arabe: ما شاء الله لا قوة إلا بالله.
anglais: Whatever Allah wills, there is no power except through Allah.
translitteration: Mā shā’ Allāh, lā quwwata illā Billāh.

arabe: اللهم اجعلني أُحسن الظن بما يصيبني.
anglais: O Allah, make me think well of what befalls me.
translitteration: Allahumma ajilnī uḥsin al-ẓann bimā yuṣībunī.

arabe: اللهم اجعل مفاجآتي سببًا لرضاك عني.
anglais: O Allah, make my surprise a cause for Your pleasure with me.
translitteration: Allahumma ajil mufājātī sababān li riḍāka ‘annī.

arabe: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن
anglais: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness
translitteration: Allaahumma ‘innee ‘a’oothu bika minal-hammi walhazani,

arabe: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ.
anglais: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best disposer of affairs
translitteration: Hasbiya Allah wa ni’mal-Wakil

arabe: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
anglais: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
translitteration: Inna ma’a al-‘usri yusra.

arabe: اللهم رحمتك أرجو، فلا تكلني إلى نفسي طرفة عين
anglais: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy, do not leave me to myself for even a blink of an eye.
translitteration: Allahumma raḥmataka arjū, falā takilnī ilā nafsī ṭarfata ‘ayn.

arabe: اللهم يا مؤنس كل وحيد، أنس وحدتي
anglais: O Allah, Companion of the lonely, accompany me in my solitude.
translitteration: Allahumma yā mu’nis kulli wāḥid, ansi waḥdatī.

arabe: اللهم اجعل لي فرجًا ومخرجًا من كل ضيق
anglais: O Allah, grant me relief and a way out of every distress.
translitteration: Allahumma ajil lī farajan wa makhrajān min kulli ḍīq.

arabe: رَبِّ إِنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
anglais: My Lord, I am overpowered, so help me.
translitteration: Rabbī innī maghlūbun fa-ntasir.

arabe: وَأَفَوِّضُ أَمْرِي إِلَى اللَّهِ
anglais: I entrust my affair to Allah.
translitteration: Wa afawwadu amrī ilā Allāh.

arabe: اللهم اجعل القرآن ربيع قلبي
anglais: O Allah, make the Qur’an the spring of my heart.
translitteration: Allahumma ajil al-Qur’āna rabī’a qalbī.

arabe: اللهم اكفني بحلالك عن حرامك
anglais: O Allah, suffice me with Your permissible (provisions) over what is forbidden.
translitteration: Allahumma ikfini bi-ḥalālika ‘an ḥarāmika.

arabe: اللهم زدنا إيمانًا ويقينًا
anglais: O Allah, increase us in faith and conviction
translitteration: Allahumma zidnā īmānan wa yaqīnan.

arabe: اللهم صبّرني ورضّني بقضائك
anglais: O Allah, grant me patience and contentment with Your decree.
translitteration: Allahumma ṣabbirnī wa raḍḍīnī bi-qaḍā’ika.

arabe: رَبِّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ
anglais: My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the whispers of the devils.
translitteration: Rabbī innī a’ūdhu bika min hamazāti ash-shayāṭīn.

arabe: اللهم أزل همي وغمّي
anglais: O Allah, remove my sorrow and grief
translitteration: Allahumma azil hammi wa ghammi.

arabe: اللهم اجعلني من عبادك الصالحين
anglais: O Allah, make me among Your righteous servants.
translitteration: Allahumma ajilnī min ‘ibādika as-ṣāliḥīn.

arabe: اللهم ارزقني الرضا بالقضاء
anglais: O Allah, grant me contentment with Your decree.
translitteration: Allahumma rizuqnī ar-riḍā bi-l-qaḍā’.

arabe: اللهم اجعلني ممن يستمع القول فيتبع أحسنه
anglais: O Allah, make me among those who listen to good words and follow the best of them.
translitteration: Allahumma ajilnī mimman yastami’u al-qawla fa-yattabi’u aḥsanah.

arabe: اللهم اجعلني من المتوكلين عليك
anglais: O Allah, make me among those who rely upon You.
translitteration: Allahumma ajilnī min al-mutawakkilīn ‘alayk.

arabe: اللهم اجعل كل عسر يمرني خيرًا لي
anglais: O Allah, make every hardship I go through a means of goodness for me.
translitteration: Allahumma ajil kulla ‘usrin yamurnī khayran lī.

arabe: اَحَسِبَ النَّاسُ اَنْ يُّتْرَكُوْٓا اَنْ يَّقُوْلُوْٓا اٰمَنَّا وَهُمْ لَا يُفْتَنُوْنَ [ العنكبوت: 2 ]
anglais: Do people think they will be left alone after saying ‘We believe’ without being put to the test?” (Surah Al ‘Ankabut 29:2).

arabe: ﴿يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ﴾ [ البقرة: 153 ]
anglais: “O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.” (Al Baqarah, Ayah 153).

arabe: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
anglais: There is no might and no power except with Allah.
translitteration: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah

arabe: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي عَبْـدُكَ ابْنُ عَبْـدِكَ ابْنُ أَمَتِـكَ نَاصِيَتِي بِيَـدِكَ، مَاضٍ فِيَّ حُكْمُكَ، عَدْلٌ فِيَّ قَضَاؤكَ أَسْأَلُـكَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ هُوَ لَكَ سَمَّـيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ أِوْ أَنْزَلْتَـهُ فِي كِتَابِكَ، أَوْ عَلَّمْـتَهُ أَحَداً مِنْ خَلْقِـكَ أَوِ اسْتَـأْثَرْتَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِ الغَيْـبِ عِنْـدَكَ أَنْ تَجْـعَلَ القُرْآنَ رَبِيـعَ قَلْبِـي، وَنورَ صَـدْرِي وجَلَاءَ حُـزْنِي وذَهَابَ هَمِّـي
anglais: ‘O Allah, I am Your slave and the son of Your male slave and the son of your female slave. My forehead is in Your Hand (i.e. you have control over me). Your Judgment upon me is assured, and Your Decree concerning me is just. I ask You by every Name that You have named Yourself with, revealed in Your Book, taught any one of Your creation or kept unto Yourself in the knowledge of the unseen that is with You, to make the Qur’an the spring of my heart, and the light of my chest, the banisher of my sadness and the reliever of my distress.’
translitteration: Allaahumma ‘inny ‛abduk-ibnu-‛abdik-ibnu-amatik, naaṣiyatee biyadik, maaḍin fiyya ḥukmuk, ‛adlun fiyya qaḍaa’uk, as’aluka bi kull-ismin huwa lak, sammayta bihi nafsak, aw anzaltahu fee kitaabik, aw ‛allamtahu aḥadan min khalqik, awis-ta’tharta bihi fee ‛ilmil-ghaybi ‛indak, an taj‛al-al-quraana rabee‛a qalbee, wa noora ṣadree, wa jalaa’a ḥuznee, wa dhahaa-ba hammee

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ رَحْمَتَكَ أَرْجُو فَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَا أَنْتَ
anglais: ‘O Allah, it is Your mercy that I hope for, so do not leave me in charge of my affairs even for a blink of an eye, and rectify for me all of my affairs. None has the right to be worshipped except You.’
translitteration: Allahumma raḥmataka arju fala takilni ila nafsi ṭarfata `ayn, wa aslih li sha’ni kullahu, la illaha illa ant.

arabe: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيْث
anglais: ‘O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, in Your Mercy I seek relief.’
translitteration: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyoom birahmatika astagheeth

arabe: اللّهُـمَّ لا سَـهْلَ إِلاّ ما جَعَلـتَهُ سَهـلاً، وَأَنْتَ تَجْـعَلُ الحَزْنَ إِذا شِـئْتَ سَهـْلاً
anglais: ‘O Allah, there is no ease except in that which You have made easy, and You make the difficulty, if You wish, easy.’
translitteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja ‘altahu sahla, wa anta taj ‘alul hazna ith-a shi’ ta’ sahlan

arabe: حسبى الله لا إله إلا هو عليه توكلت وهو رب العرش العظيم
anglais: ‘Allah is sufficient for me. There is no God except Him. I place my trust in Him, and He is the Rabb of the great throne.’
translitteration: Hasbiya Allahu la ilaha illa huwa ‘aalayhi tawakkaltu wahuwa rabbu al’aarshi al’atheem.

arabe: اللهُ اللهُ رَبِّ لا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ شَيْئاً
anglais: ‘Allah, Allah is my Lord; I do not associate anything with Him.’

arabe: إِنَّا للهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُوْنَ، اللَّهمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيْبَتِي، وَاخْلُفْ لِي خَيْرا ً مِنْهَا
anglais: ‘To Allah, we belong, and unto Him is our return. O Allah, recompense me for my affliction and replace it for me with something better.’
translitteration: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji’un. Allahumma-u’jurni fi musibati, wa akhlif li khairan minha.

arabe: لَآ إِلٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّيْ كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِيْنَ
anglais: Dua of Prophet Yunus (A.S.): ‘None has the right to be worshipped except You. How perfect You are. Verily, I was among the wrong-doers.’ – (Al Anbiya, 87) Of this dua, Prophet Muhammad is reported to have said: “No Muslim supplicates with it for anything, ever, except Allah responds to him.”--Tirmidhi
translitteration: La illaha illa anta subhanak ‘inny kuntu min aldhaalimeen

arabe: رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَا أَنزَلْتَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
anglais: Dua of Prophet Musa (A.S.): ‘My Lord! I am truly in desperate need of whatever good You may have in store for me.’ – (Al Qasas, 24)
translitteration: rabi ‘inny lima ‘anzalt ‘iilaya min khayr faqir

arabe: أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
anglais: Dua of Prophet Ayub (A.S.): ‘Indeed, distress has befallen me, and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.’ – (Al Anbiya, 83)
translitteration: annee massaniya alddurru waanta arhamu alrrahimeen

arabe: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ و اللهُ أَكْبرُ
anglais: Glory is to Allah wa Allah is the Most Great.
translitteration: Subhaanallaah Allaahu 'Akbar

arabe: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَط
anglais: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from the decline of Your blessings, the passing of safety, the sudden onset of Your punishment and from all that displeases you.
translitteration: Allahumma inni a’udhu bika min zawali ni’matika, wa tahawwuli ‘afiyatika, wa fuja’ati niqmatika, wa jami’i sakhatika

arabe: -اَللّٰهُمَّ يَا- فَاطِرَ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ، أَنْتَ وَلِـيِّيْ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ ، تَوَفَّنِيْ مُسْلِمًا وَّأَلْحِقْنِيْ بِالصَّالِحِيْنَ
anglais: (O Allah), Originator of the heavens and the earth, You are my Protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Make me die a Muslim and join me with the righteous. (12:101)
translitteration: (Allāhumma yā) Fāṭira-s-samāwāti wa-l-arḍi Anta waliy-yi fi-d-dunyā wal-ākhirah, tawaffanī Muslimaw-wa alḥiqnī bi-ṣ-ṣāliḥīn.

arabe: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ بِنِعْمَتِهِ تَتِمُّ الصَّالِحَاتُ
anglais: All praise is for Allah through whose blessing righteous actions are accomplished.
translitteration: Al-ḥamdu li-llāh-ladhī bi-niʿmatihī tattimmu-ṣ-ṣāliḥāt.

arabe: اللهم اجعلني شاكراً لنعمك
anglais: O Allah, make me grateful for Your blessings.
translitteration: Allahumma aj’alni shaakiran li-ni’amika

arabe: اللهم لك الحمد كما ينبغي لجلال وجهك وعظيم سلطانك
anglais: O Allah, to You belongs all praise as befits the majesty of Your face and the greatness of Your authority.
translitteration: Allahumma laka-l-ḥamd kamā yanbaghī li-jalāli wajhika wa-ʿaẓīmi sulṭānika

arabe: الحمد لله على كل حال
anglais: Praise be to Allah in all circumstances.
translitteration: Alḥamdu lillāhi ʿalā kulli ḥāl

arabe: اللهم اجعلني من عبادك الشاكرين
anglais: O Allah, make me among Your grateful servants.
translitteration: Allahumma aj’alni min ‘ibaadika-sh-shaakireen

arabe: سبحان الله وبحمده سبحان الله العظيم
anglais: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him; glory be to Allah the Most Great.
translitteration: Subhaanallaahi wa biḥamdihi Subhaanallaahil-‘Aẓeem

arabe: اللهم أدم عليّ نعمة الفرح
anglais: O Allah, perpetuate the blessing of joy upon me.
translitteration: Allahumma adim ‘alayya ni’mata-l-farah

arabe: اللهم إني أشكرك على نعمك الكثيرة
anglais: O Allah, I thank You for Your abundant blessings
translitteration: Allahumma inni ashkuruka ‘ala ni’amika-l-katheera

arabe: الحمد لله على نعمة الإسلام
anglais: Praise be to Allah for the blessing of Islam.
translitteration: Alḥamdu lillāhi ‘ala ni’mati-l-Islam

arabe: اللهم بارك لي في ما أعطيتني
anglais: O Allah, bless what You have given me.
translitteration: Allahumma baarik li fī mā a’ṭaytani

arabe: ربنا آتنا في الدنيا حسنة وفي الآخرة حسنة
anglais: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter.
translitteration: Rabbanaa aatina fi-d-dunyaa ḥasana wa fi-l-aakhirati ḥasana

arabe: اللهم اجعلني مباركًا أينما كنت
anglais: O Allah, make me blessed wherever I am.
translitteration: Allahumma aj’alni mubaarakan aynamā kunt

arabe: اللهم لك الحمد ملء السماوات والأرض.
anglais: O Allah, to You belongs all praise filling the heavens and the earth.
translitteration: Allahumma laka-l-ḥamd mil’a-s-samāwāti wa-l-arḍ

arabe: اللهم زدني من فضلك وكرمك
anglais: O Allah, increase me in Your bounty and generosity.
translitteration: Allahumma zidni min faḍlika wa karamika

arabe: الحمد لله الذي أعطاني أكثر مما أستحق
anglais: Praise be to Allah who gave me more than I deserve.
translitteration: Alḥamdu lillāhi lladhī a’ṭānī akthara mimmā astahiqu

arabe: اللهم اجعلني من الشاكرين لكل لحظة سعادة
anglais: O Allah, make me among those who are grateful for every moment of happiness.
translitteration: Allahumma aj’alni min-a-shaakireen li-kulli laḥẓati sa’āda

arabe: اللهم اخرجني من الظلمات إلى النور
anglais: Oh Allah take me out of darkness and into the light.
translitteration: Allahumma Akhrijnee min adhulumaati ilaa annur.

arabe: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِالله
anglais: There is no power or strength except with Allah. [Hadith | Ibn Majah]
translitteration: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.

arabe: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيْث
anglais: O Ever-Living, O Self-Subsisting Sustainer of all, I seek help through Your mercy
translitteration: Yaa Hayyu yaa Qayyum, bi-rahmatika astaghith.

arabe: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنفُسَنَا وَإنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْلَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الخَاسِرِينَ
anglais: Our Lord! We have wronged ourselves. If You do not forgive us and have mercy on us, we will certainly be lost. [Qur’an | Surah Al-A’raf | 7:23
translitteration: Rabbana zalamna anfusana wa-in lam taghfir lana wa-tarhamna la-nakunanna minal-khasirin

arabe: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّافَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
anglais: Our Lord! surely we believe, therefore forgive us our faults and save us from the chastisement of the fire, [Qur’an | Surah Al-Imran | 3:16]

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي مَا قَدَّمْتُ وَمَا أَخَّرْتُ، وَمَا أَسْرَرْتُ وَمَا أَعْلَنْتُ وَمَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي، أَنْتَ المُقَدِّمُ وَأَنْتَ المُؤَخِّرُ وَأَنْتَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِير
anglais: O Allah! Forgive me for those sins which I committed in the past and that which I may commit in the future, the sins that I have committed in privacy or in public and all the sins of which You are better aware of it than I am of myself. You are The One who bring forward and reprieve as You wish and indeed You are over all things capable. [Sahih Muslim]
translitteration: Allahumma-ghfir lii maa qaddamtu wa maa akh-khortu wa maa asrortu wa maa a’lantu wa maa anta a’lamu bihi minnii, anta Al-Muqaddimu wa anta Al-Muakh-khiru wa anta alaa kulli shai-in qadir.

arabe: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الأَبْرَارِ
anglais: Our Lord! Forgive our sins, remove from us our misdeeds, and grant that we join the righteous when we die. [Qur’an | Surah Al-Imran | 3:193]
translitteration: Rabbana fa-ghfir lana zunuubana wa-kaffir anna sayyi-aatina wa-tafawwafaa maal-abrar

arabe: اللهمّ فارج الهم، كاشف الغم، مذهب الحزن، اكشف اللهمّ عنّي همّي وغمّي ، وأذهب عنّي حزني
anglais: Oh Allah, Reliever of anxiety, Remover of distress, Dispeller of grief! Remove my anxiety, distress, and dispel from me my sadness.
translitteration: Allahumma Faarij alhamm, kaashif alGamm, muzhib alhuzn, ikshif Allahumma 3annee hammee wa Gammee, wa azhib 3annee huznee.

arabe: اللهم امنحني القوة لأقاوم نفسي، والشجاعة لأواجه ضعفي، واليقين لأتقبل قدري، والرضا ليرتاح عقلي، والفهم ليطمئن قلبي
anglais: Oh Allah! Grant me the strength to oppose myself, the courage to face my weakness, the conviction to accept my faith, the satisfaction of to relax my mind, and the understanding to reassure my heart.
translitteration: Allahumma imnaHnee alQuwwah li aQwaami nafseee, wa ash-Shujaa3ah li uwaajih da3fee, wa alYaqeeni li ataQabbal qadree, wa ar-riDaa li yartaah 3aQalee, wa alfahm li yaTmainna Qalbee.

arabe: يارب امسح على صدري برحمتك
anglais: Oh Lord, wipe my chest clean with your mercy.
translitteration: Ya Rabb, Imsah Sadree biraHmatik.

arabe: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيم
anglais:
Allah – there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, And they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, And their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great. [ayat kurssi --Surat El baqarah]
translitteration: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa-l-ḥayyu-l-qayyūm Lā ta’khudhuhu sinatun wa lā nawm Lahu mā fī-s-samāwāti wa mā fī-l-arḍ Man dhā-l-ladhī yashfa’u ‘indahu illā bi-idhnih Ya’lamu mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum Wa lā yuḥīṭūna bi shay’in min ‘ilmihi illā bimā shā’a Wasi’a kursiyyuhu-s-samāwāti wa-l-arḍ Wa lā ya’ūduhu ḥifẓuhumā wa huwa l-‘aliyyu-l-‘aẓīm

arabe: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
anglais: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One, Allah, the Eternal Refuge. He neither begets nor is born, Nor is there to Him any equivalent. [ Surat Al-Eikhlass ]
translitteration: Bismillāhi-r-raḥmāni-r-raḥīm Qul huwa Allāhu 'aḥad Allāhu ṣ-ṣamad Lam yalid wa lam yūlad Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan 'aḥad

arabe: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
anglais: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak, From the evil of that which He created, And from the evil of darkness when it settles, And from the evil of the blowers in knots, And from the evil of an envier when he envies. [ Surat El-Falaq ]
translitteration: Bismillāhi-r-raḥmāni-r-raḥīm Qul a‘ūdhu bi-Rabbi-l-falaq Min sharri mā khalaq Wa min sharri ghāsiqin idhā waqab Wa min sharri-n-naffāthāti fī-l-‘uqad Wa min sharri ḥāsidin idhā ḥasad

arabe: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مَلِكِ النَّاسِ إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
anglais: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, The Sovereign of mankind, The God of mankind, From the evil of the retreating whisperer – Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind – From among jinn and mankind. [ Surat An-nass ]
translitteration: Bismillāhi-r-raḥmāni-r-raḥīm Qul a‘ūdhu bi-Rabbi-n-nās Maliki-n-nās Ilāhi-n-nās Min sharri-l-waswāsi-l-khannās Alladhī yuwaswisu fī ṣudūri-n-nās Mina-l-jinnati wa-n-nās

arabe: أعوذ بالله من الشيطان الرجيم
anglais: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil.
translitteration: A‘ūdhu billāhi mina-sh-shayṭāni-r-rajīm

arabe: اللهم إني أسألك الحلم عند الغضب
anglais: O Allah, I ask You for forbearance during anger.
translitteration: Allāhumma innī as’aluka-l-ḥilma ‘inda-l-ghaḍab

arabe: اللهم اجعلني من الكاظمين الغيظ والعافين عن الناس
anglais: O Allah, make me among those who suppress anger and pardon others.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī mina-l-kāẓimīna-l-ghayẓa wa-l-‘āfīna ‘ani-n-nās

arabe: اللهم ارزقني الصبر عند الغضب
anglais: Allāhumma urzuqnī-ṣ-ṣabra ‘inda-l-ghaḍab
translitteration: Allāhumma urzuqnī-ṣ-ṣabra ‘inda-l-ghaḍab

arabe: اللهم اجعلني هادئًا في كل حالاتي
anglais: O Allah, make me calm in all my states.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī hādi’an fī kulli ḥālātī

arabe: اللهم اطفئ نار غضبي
anglais: O Allah, extinguish the fire of my anger.
translitteration: Allāhumma aṭfi’ nāra ghaḍabī

arabe: اللهم اغفر لي إذا غضبت
anglais: O Allah, forgive me when I am angry
translitteration: Allāhumma-ighfir lī idhā ghaḍibtu

arabe: اللهم اجعلني أتفكر قبل أن أتكلم عند الغضب
anglais: O Allah, make me reflect before I speak when angry.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī atafakkaru qabla an atakallama ‘inda-l-ghaḍab

arabe: اللهم اجعلني أحسن الظن بالناس
anglais: O Allah, make me think well of others.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī uḥsinu-ẓ-ẓanna bi-n-nās

arabe: اللهم أزل عني الضيق والغضب
anglais: O Allah, remove distress and anger from me.
translitteration: Allāhumma azil ‘annī aḍ-ḍīqa wa-l-ghaḍab

arabe: اللهم ارزقني الرحمة بدل الغضب
anglais: O Allah, grant me mercy instead of anger.
translitteration: Allāhumma urzuqnī ar-raḥmata badala-l-ghaḍab

arabe: اللهم اجعلني أتذكر ثواب الحلم عند الغضب
anglais: O Allah, make me remember the reward of patience when angry.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī atadhakkaru thawāba-l-ḥilmi ‘inda-l-ghaḍab

arabe: اللهم اجعلني من عبادك الذين لا يغضبون إلا لك
anglais: O Allah, make me among Your servants who do not get angry except for Your sake.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī min ‘ibādika alladhīna lā yaghḍabūna illā laka

arabe: اللهم اجعلني ممن إذا غضب ذكر الله فسكَن
anglais: O Allah, make me among those who, when angry, remember You and find calm.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘alnī mimman idhā ghaḍiba dhakara Allāha fa-sakana.

arabe: اللهم اهدني إلى طريق الرضا بدل الغضب
anglais: O Allah, guide me to the path of contentment instead of anger.
translitteration: Allāhumma ihdinī ilā ṭarīqi-r-riḍā badala-l-ghaḍab.

arabe: اللهم اجعل كلماتي نورًا لا نارًا
anglais: O Allah, make my words a light, not a fire.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘al kalimātī nūran lā nāran

arabe: اللهم اجعل غضبي رحمة لا نقمة
anglais: O Allah, make my anger a source of mercy, not harm.
translitteration: Allāhumma aj‘al ghaḍabī raḥmatan lā niqmah

arabe: فَسَيَكْفِيكَهُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
anglais: Allah will suffice you against them, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing. (Surah Al-Baqarah 2:137)
translitteration: Fasayakfīkahumu-llāhu wa huwa-s-samī‘u-l-‘alīm.

arabe: إِنَّمَا ذَٰلِكُمُ الشَّيْطَانُ يُخَوِّفُ أَوْلِيَاءَهُ فَلَا تَخَافُوهُمْ وَخَافُونِ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
anglais: It is only Satan who frightens [you] of his supporters. So fear them not, but fear Me, if you are [indeed] believers. (Surah Aal-E-Imran 3:175)
translitteration: Innamā dhālikumu-sh-shayṭānu yukhawwifu awliyā’ahu fa-lā takhāfūhum wa-khāfūnī in kuntum mu’minīn.

arabe: لَا تَحْزَنْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَنَا
anglais: Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us. (Surah At-Tawbah 9:40)
translitteration: Lā taḥzan inna-llāha ma‘anā.

arabe: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
anglais: My Lord, expand for me my chest, ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue that they may understand my speech (Surah Ta-Ha 20:25-28)
translitteration: Rabbi ashrah lī ṣadrī wa yassir lī amrī waḥlul ‘uqdatan min lisānī yafqahū qawlī

arabe: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنْي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانْتَصِرْ
anglais: So he called upon his Lord, 'I am overwhelmed, so grant me victory. (Surah Al-Qamar 54:10)
translitteration: Fa da'ā rabbahu annī maghlūbun fantasir.

arabe: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ
anglais: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent.( Sahih al-Bukhari )
translitteration: Man kāna yu’minu billāhi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri falyaqul khayran aw liyasmut.

arabe: لَا تَغْضَبْ وَلَكَ الْجَنَّةُ
anglais: Do not become angry, and paradise is yours. ( Sahih Muslim )
translitteration: Lā taghdab walaka al-jannah.

arabe: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ الْجَاهِلُونَ قَالُوا سَلاَمًا
anglais: nd the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace. ( Surah Al-Furqan 25:63 )
translitteration: Wa 'ibādu ar-rahmāni alladhīna yamshūna 'alā al-arḍi hawnan wa idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāmā.

arabe: اَللّٰهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ ، فَاطِرَ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيْكَهُ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَّا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِيْ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِيْ سُوْءًا ، أَوْ أَجُرَّهُ إِلَىٰ مُسْلِمٍ.
anglais: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, the Lord and Sovereign of everything; I bear witness that there is no god worthy of worship but You. I seek Your protection from the evil of my own self, from the evil of Shayṭān and from the evil of polytheism to which he calls,and from inflicting evil on myself, or bringing it upon a Muslim.
translitteration: Allāhumma ʿālima-l-ghaybi wa-sh-shahādah, fāṭir-as-samāwāti wa-l-arḍi, rabba kulli shay’iw-wa malīkah, ash-hadu al-lā ilāha illā Anta, aʿūdhu bika min sharri nafsī wa min sharri-sh-shayṭāni wa shirkihī wa an aqtarifa ʿalā nafsī sū’an aw ajurrahū ilā muslim.

arabe: اَللّٰهُمَّ مَا أَمْسَىٰ بِيْ مِنْ نِّعْمَةٍ أَوْ بِأَحَدٍ مِّنْ خَلْقِكَ ، فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيْكَ لَكَ ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ
anglais: O Allah, all the favours that I or anyone from Your creation has received in the evening, are from You Alone. You have no partner. To You Alone belong all praise and all thanks.
translitteration: Allāhumma mā amsā bī min niʿmatin aw bi-aḥadin min khalqik, fa-minka waḥdaka lā sharīka lak, fa laka-l-ḥamdu wa laka-sh-shukr.

arabe: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَمْسَيْتُ أُشْهِدُكَ وَأُشْهِدُ حَمَلَةَ عَرْشِكَ وَمَلَائِكَتَكَ وَجَمِيْعَ خَلْقِكَ ، أَنَّكَ أَنْتَ اللّٰهُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيْكَ لَكَ ، وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُوْلُكَ.
anglais: O Allah, I have entered the evening, and I call upon You, the bearers of Your Throne, Your angels and all creation, to bear witness that surely You are Allah. There is no god worthy of worship except You Alone. You have no partners, and that Muḥammad ﷺ is Your slave and Your Messenger.
translitteration: Allāhumma innī amsaytu ush-hiduka, wa ush-hidu ḥamlata ʿarshika, wa malā’ikatika, wa jamī’a khalqika, annaka Anta-llāhu lā ilāha illā Anta waḥdak, lā sharīka lak, wa an-na Muḥammadan ʿabduka wa rasūluk.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ، وَحُبَّ مَنْ يُحِبُّكَ، وَالْعَمَلَ الَّذِي يُبَلِّغُنِي حُبَّكَ. اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ حُبَّكَ أَحَبَّ إِلَيَّ مِنْ نَفْسِي وَأَهْلِي وَمِنَ الْمَاءِ الْبَارِدِ.
anglais: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and the actions that will lead me to Your love. O Allah, make Your love dearer to me than myself, my family, and even cool water.
translitteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka hubbaka, wa hubba man yuhibbuka, wal-‘amala alladhi yuballighuni hubbaka. Allahumma aj‘al hubbaka ahabba ilayya min nafsi wa ahli wa mina al-ma’ al-barid.

arabe: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي جَمَعَ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِنَا بِحُبِّهِ وَطَاعَتِهِ.
anglais: All praise is due to Allah, who has united our hearts through His love and obedience.
translitteration: Alhamdulillahi alladhi jama‘a bayna qulubina bihubbihi wa ta‘atihi.

arabe: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
anglais: Our Lord, grant us from among our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us leaders for the righteous. (Sourate Al-Furqan 25:74)
translitteration: Rabbana hablana min azwajina wa dhurriyyatina qurrata a‘yunin waj‘alna lil-muttaqina imama.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْمَعْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ مَنْ أُحِبُّ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَفِي جَنَّاتِكَ الْخَالِدَةِ.
anglais: O Allah, unite me with those I love in this world and in Your eternal gardens.
translitteration: Allahumma ajma‘ bayni wa bayna man uhibbu fi al-dunya wa fi jannatika al-khalidah.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْ قُلُوبَنَا مِنَ الْبَغْضَاءِ وَالْكَرَاهِيَةِ، وَامْلَأْهَا بِالْمَحَبَّةِ وَالرِّضَا.
anglais: O Allah, purify our hearts from hatred and animosity, and fill them with love and contentment.
translitteration: Allahumma tahhir qulubana mina al-bughda’i wal-karahiyati, wa amla’ha bil-mahabbati wal-rida.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مَحْبُوبًا فِي قُلُوبِ النَّاسِ، وَاجْعَلْ حُبَّكَ فَوْقَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ.
anglais: O Allah, make me beloved in the hearts of people, and make Your love supreme above all else.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘alni mahbuban fi qulub al-nasi, waj‘al hubbaka fawqa kulli shay’.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْمَعْ قُلُوبَنَا عَلَى طَاعَتِكَ، وَامْلَأْهَا بِالْمَحَبَّةِ وَالرَّحْمَةِ.
anglais: O Allah, unite our hearts in obedience to You and fill them with love and mercy.
translitteration: Allahumma ajma‘ qulubana ‘ala ta‘atika, wa amla’ha bil-mahabbati wal-rahmah.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ زَوْجِي مَوَدَّةً وَرَحْمَةً، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي حُبِّنَا.
anglais: O Allah, place affection and mercy between me and my spouse, and bless our love.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘al bayni wa bayna zawji mawaddatan wa rahmatan, wa barik lana fi hubbina.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي أُحِبُّ لِلنَّاسِ مَا أُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِي، وَزَيِّنْ قَلْبِي بِالْإِيمَانِ وَالْمَحَبَّةِ.
anglais: O Allah, make me love for others what I love for myself, and adorn my heart with faith and love.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘alni uhibbu li al-nasi ma uhibbu li nafsi, wa zayyina qalbi bil-iman wal-mahabbah.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْ قَلْبِي مِنْ كُلِّ حُبٍّ يُبَاعِدُنِي عَنْكَ، وَامْلَأْهُ بِحُبِّكَ وَحُبِّ رَسُولِكَ.
anglais: O Allah, purify my heart from any love that distances me from You, and fill it with Your love and the love of Your Messenger.
translitteration: Allahumma tahhir qalbi min kulli hubbin yuba‘iduni ‘anka, wa amla’hu bihubbika wa hubbi rasulika.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ حَقِّقْ لِي كُلَّ مَا أَتَمَنَّى وَأَكْثَر.
anglais: O Allah, grant me everything I wish for and even more.
translitteration: Allahumma haqqiq li kulla ma atamanna wa akthar.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْمَعْنِي بِأَهْلِي فِي مَحَبَّتِكَ، وَزِدْنَا تَوَاصُلًا وَمَوَدَّةً.
anglais: O Allah, unite me with my family in Your love and increase our connection and affection.
translitteration: Allahumma ajma‘ni bi ahli fi mahabbatika, wa zidna tawasulan wa mawaddatan.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ الْمَحَبَّةَ سَبَبًا لِلتَّوَافُقِ وَالسَّكِينَةِ فِي أَوْقَاتِ الشِّدَّةِ.
anglais: O Allah, make love a cause of harmony and tranquility in times of hardship.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘al al-mahabbata sababaan lil-tawafuq wal-sakinah fi awqat al-shiddah.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ زَيِّنْ قُلُوبَنَا بِالْمَحَبَّةِ الصَّافِيَةِ، وَابْعِدْ عَنَّا كُلَّ حِقْدٍ وَغِلٍّ.
anglais: O Allah, adorn our hearts with pure love and keep away from us all grudges and envy.
translitteration: Allahumma zayyin qulubana bil-mahabbati al-safiyah, wab‘id ‘anna kulla hiqdin wa ghillin.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْ أَحِبَّتِي فِي غِيَابِهِمْ، وَارْزُقْهُمْ رِضَاكَ وَرَحْمَتَكَ.
anglais: O Allah, protect my loved ones in their absence and bless them with Your pleasure and mercy.
translitteration: Allahumma ihfaz ahibbati fi ghiyabihim, warzuqhum ridaka wa rahmataka.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي سَبَبًا فِي نَشْرِ الْمَحَبَّةِ وَالسَّلَامِ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ.
anglais: O Allah, make me a source of spreading love and peace among people.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘alni sababaan fi nashri al-mahabbati wal-salam bayna al-nas.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِمَّنْ يُحِبُّونَ هُدَاكَ وَيَسِيرُونَ عَلَى صِرَاطِكَ الْمُسْتَقِيمِ.
anglais: O Allah, make me among those who love Your guidance and walk on Your straight path.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘alni mimman yuhibbuna hudaka wa yasiruna ‘ala siratika al-mustaqim.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ أَرْزُقْ أَحِبَّتِي الْقُوَّةَ فِي ضَعْفِهِمْ، وَالْفَرَجَ فِي ضِيقِهِمْ.
anglais: O Allah, grant my loved ones strength in their weakness and relief in their hardship.
translitteration: Allahumma arzuq ahibbati al-quwwata fi du‘fihim, wal-faraja fi diqihim.

arabe: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الَّذِي يُفَاجِئُنَا بِنِعَمِهِ وَفَضْلِهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ.
anglais: Glory be to Allah, who surprises us with His blessings and grace. There is no god but Him.
translitteration: Subhana Allah alladhi yufaji’una bini‘amihi wafadlihi, la ilaha illa Hu.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى مَا أُفَاجَأُ بِهِ، وَارْزُقْنِي صَبْرًا وَحِكْمَةً.
anglais: O Allah, help me with what I am unexpectedly faced with, and grant me patience and wisdom.
translitteration: Allahumma a‘inni ‘ala ma ufaja’u bihi, warzuqni sabran wa hikmah.

arabe: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ، مَا أَعْظَمَ خَلْقَهُ!
anglais: Glory and praise be to Allah. Glory be to Allah, the Most Great. How magnificent is His creation!
translitteration: Subhana Allah wa bihamdihi, Subhana Allah al-‘Azim, ma a‘zama khalqahu!

arabe: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَفْرَحَ قَلْبِي بِمَا لَمْ أَتَوَقَّعْ.
anglais: All praise is due to Allah, who brought joy to my heart in ways I did not expect.
translitteration: All praise is due to Allah, who brought joy to my heart in ways I did not expect.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ كُلَّ مُفَاجَأَةٍ خَيْرًا لِي، وَاجْعَلْ قَلْبِي رَاضِيًا بِقَدَرِكَ.
anglais: O Allah, make every surprise good for me, and make my heart content with Your decree.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘al kulla mufaja’ah khayran li, waj‘al qalbi radiyan bi-qadrika.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ أَرِنِي الْحَقَّ حَقًّا، وَأَرْزُقْنِي اتِّبَاعَهُ، وَاجْعَلْ كُلَّ مَا يُفَاجِئُنِي خَيْرًا لِنَفْسِي.
anglais: O Allah, show me the truth as truth and guide me to follow it, and make everything that surprises me good for my soul.
translitteration: Allahumma arini al-haqqa haqqan, warzuqni ittiba‘ahu, waj‘al kulla ma yufaji’uni khayran li nafsi.

arabe: سُبْحَانَكَ يَا رَبَّ الْعَظَمَةِ، مَا أَعْجَبَ قُدْرَتَكَ وَمَا أَغْرَبَ حِكْمَتَكَ!
anglais: Glory be to You, O Lord of Majesty. How wondrous is Your power, and how extraordinary is Your wisdom!
translitteration: Subhanaka ya Rabb al-‘Azamah, ma a‘jaba qudrataka wa ma aghraba hikmataka!

arabe: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَى كُلِّ مَا يُبْهِرُنِي، فَهُوَ الْكَرِيمُ الْحَكِيمُ.
anglais: All praise is to Allah for everything that amazes me, for He is the Most Generous, the Most Wise.
translitteration: Alhamdulillah ‘ala kulli ma yubhiruni, fahuwa al-Karim al-Hakim.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ فَجَأْتَنِي بِمَا لَمْ أَحْتَسِبْ، فَسَابِغٌ عَلَيَّ رَحْمَتُكَ.
anglais: O Allah, You have surprised me with what I did not anticipate, so let Your mercy encompass me.
translitteration: Allahumma innaka faja’tani bima lam ahtasib, fasabigh ‘alayya rahmatuka.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّ لَكَ فِي كُلِّ أَمْرٍ عَجَبًا يَفْجَأُ قُلُوبَنَا وَيُسَبِّحُ لَكَ كُلُّ مَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ.
anglais: O Allah, for You, in every matter, there is something surprising that astonishes our hearts, and everything in the heavens and the earth praises You.
translitteration: Allahumma inn laka fi kulli amrin ‘ajaban yafja’u qulubana wa yusabbihu laka kulla ma fi al-sama’i wal-ard.

arabe: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ كُلَّ مَا يَفَاجِئُنِي مِنْ لُطْفِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ.
anglais: O Allah, make everything that surprises me a manifestation of Your kindness and mercy.
translitteration: Allahumma aj‘al kulla ma yufaji’uni min lutfika wa rahmatika.

arabe: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَّلَمْ يَكُنْ لَّهُ شَرِيْكٌ فِي الْمُلْكِ وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَّهُ وَلِيٌّ مِّنَ الذُّلِّ.
anglais: All praise is for Allah who has not taken a son, has no partner in His dominion and does not need anyone, out of weakness, to protect Him. (17:111)
translitteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi-lladhī lam yattakhidh walada-w-walam yaku-l-lahū sharīkun fī l-mulki walam yakul-lahū waliyyum-minadh-dhul.

arabe: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمٰوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ فِيْ الْآخِرَةِ ، وَهُوَ الْحَكِيْمُ الْخَبِـيْرُ.
anglais: All praise is for Allah, to whom belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is on the earth; and for Him is all praise in the Hereafter. He is the All-Wise, the All-Aware. (34:1)
translitteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi-lladhī lahū mā fi-s-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa lahu-l-ḥamdu fil-ākhirah, wa huwa-l-Ḥakīm-ul-Khabīr.

arabe: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ ، عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ ، وَرِضَا نَفْسِهِ ، وَزِنَةَ عَرْشِهِ ، وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ
anglais: Allah is free from imperfection and all praise is for Him, (in ways) as numerous as all He has created, (as vast) as His pleasure, (as limitless) as the weight of His Throne, and (as endless) as the ink of His words. (Muslim)
translitteration: Subḥāna-llāhi wa bi ḥamdih, ʿadada khalqih, wa riḍā nafsih, wa zinata ʿarshih, wa midāda kalimātih.

arabe: سُبْحَانَ ذِي الْجَبَرُوْتِ ، وَالْمَلَكُوْتِ ، والْكِبْرِيَاءِ ، وَالْعَظَمَةِ
anglais: How free from imperfection is the Owner of might, dominion, magnificence and greatness. (Nasā’ī)
translitteration: Subḥāna Dhil-jabarūti wal-malakūt, wal-kibriyā’i wal-ʿaẓamah.

arabe: سُبُّوْحٌ ، قُدُّوْسٌ ، رَبُّ الْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالرُّوْحِ
anglais: The Supremely Perfect, the Most Pure, the Lord of the angels and the Spirit (Jibrīl).
translitteration: Subbūḥun, Quddūsun, Rabbul-malā’ikati wa-r-rūḥ

arabe: لَا إِلٰهَ إلَّا اللّٰهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ ، رَبُّ السَّمٰـوٰتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيْزُ الْغَفَّارُ
anglais: There is no god worthy of worship except Allah, the One, the Supremely Powerful; Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is in between them, the All-Mighty, the Most Forgiving.
translitteration: Lā ilāha illa-llāhul-Wāḥid-ul-Qahhār, Rabbu-s-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahum-al-ʿAzīz-ul-Ghaffār.

arabe: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ بِأَنَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدَ ، لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ الْمَنَّانُ ، بَدِيْعُ السَّمٰـوٰتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ، يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ ، يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ
anglais: O Allah, I beg You as all praise only belongs to You. There is no god worthy of worship except You, the Giver of all good, the Originator of the heavens and the earth. O Lord of Majesty and Honour, O the Ever Living, O the One who sustains and protects all that exists.
translitteration: Allāhumma innī as’aluka bi-anna laka-l-ḥamd, lā ilāha illā Antal-Mannān, Badīʿu-s-samāwāti wal-arḍ, yā Dhal-jalāli wal-ikrām, yā Ḥayyu yā Qayyūm.
